translation.en: [man] Rolling!
translation.ja: 回すぞ

translation.en: And action!
translation.ja: アクション

translation.en: [man 1] This is very much a Breaking Bad movie.
translation.ja: 「ブレイキング･バット」 映画版だ

translation.en: It feels a bit like Old Home Week. It feels a bit like déjà vu.
translation.ja: 懐かしさを感じるし 既視感もある 懐かしさを感じるし 既視感もある 脚本／監督 ヴィンス･ギリガン

translation.en: [man 2] Vince runs such an incredible ship.
translation.ja: ヴィンスの統率力には脱帽だ

translation.en: It feels good to be back in his camp.
translation.ja: また一緒にやれて うれしい また一緒にやれて うれしい ジェシー役／製作 アーロン･ポール

translation.en: [woman] We've come back together
translation.ja: 最終シーズンの終了後 ５年経って

translation.en: around five years after wrapping the last season of Breaking Bad.
translation.ja: 最終シーズンの終了後 ５年経って 再び集まった 再び集まった 製作　メリッサ･ バーンスタイン

translation.en: It was one of the great conclusions ever to a TV series,
translation.ja: ドラマの結末は すばらしかった ドラマの結末は すばらしかった 製作　チャールズ･ ニューワース

translation.en: and to continue the story was amazing.
translation.ja: その続きを作るなんて最高だ

translation.en: [Mike] Only you can decide what's best for you, Jesse.
translation.ja: 自分で決めるしかない

translation.en: Not sure I should stick around town.
translation.ja: 街を出ようかと

translation.en: That's a start.
translation.ja: そうだな

translation.en: [Aaron] I knew that this story started with where we left off in Breaking Bad,
translation.ja: この映画はシリーズ最終話の 直後から始まるが

translation.en: but I had no idea where it was heading.
translation.ja: その先は想像できなかった

translation.en: [Vince] We were very protective of the script. The actors had to come to us
translation.ja: 脚本はその場でしか読ませず

translation.en: and read the one copy we kept under lock and key.
translation.ja: その１冊は 鍵をかけ厳重に保管した

translation.en: After reading the script,
translation.ja: 脚本を読んで分かった

translation.en: I get a deeper look at what truly was going on
translation.ja: 脚本を読んで分かった 組織による監禁中 ジェシーに何が起こったのか

translation.en: within that concrete hole that the Nazis held Jesse in.
translation.ja: 組織による監禁中 ジェシーに何が起こったのか

translation.en: You're given little tidbits that you never knew you missed
translation.ja: 気にもしない ささいな情報が 気にもしない ささいな情報が トッド役 ジェシー･プレモンス

translation.en: that sort of alter the end of the show in some way.
translation.ja: 結末を変えていくことに なるんだ

translation.en: Good behavior. Right?
translation.ja: 行儀良くしろよ

translation.en: I think the story of this film is really about the struggle to survive.
translation.ja: 生き抜くために戦う姿が 描かれている

translation.en: You know, it follows a man on the run,
translation.ja: つまり逃亡中の男が

translation.en: who will truly stop at nothing to finally become free.
translation.ja: 手段を選ばずに 自由を手にしようとする

translation.en: You're apexing too early. You're apexing too early!
translation.ja: ターンインが速すぎる

translation.en: I'm apexing at the apex, bitch. Don't be telling me how to drive and shit.
translation.ja: どう運転しようが俺の勝手だ

translation.en: You couldn't drive a two-button elevator.
translation.ja: 機械オンチのくせに

translation.en: You couldn't drive Miss Daisy.
translation.ja: お前は ばあさんか？

translation.en: -Whatever that means. -[Jesse grunting]
translation.ja: 何だそれ

translation.en: [Aaron] The first day on set was with Skinny Pete and Badger.
translation.ja: 初日はスキニー･ピートと バッジャーと一緒だった

translation.en: It was nice to have that trio back together.
translation.ja: ３人組の復活は うれしかったよ

translation.en: Feel like a new man?
translation.ja: 別人の気分？

translation.en: Yeah. Thanks.
translation.ja: まあな

translation.en: We did our first scene with Aaron, and it was like, "Oh, yeah. This."
translation.ja: 最初のシーンから しっくりきた 最初のシーンから しっくりきた スキニー･ピート役 チャールズ･ベイカー 最初のシーンから しっくりきた 最初のシーンから しっくりきた バッジャー役 マット･ジョーンズ

translation.en: It wasn't weird.
translation.ja: 違和感はなかった

translation.en: It was just more like-- Immediately we're like, "I miss this."
translation.ja: “ああ これだよ”ってね

translation.en: You take my car.
translation.ja: 俺の車に

translation.en: I don't even like your car.
translation.ja: あんなのイヤだ

translation.en: It drives like a dick.
translation.ja: 最低の車だ

translation.en: [Matt] We're the paragons of innocence.
translation.ja: 俺ら２人は無害

translation.en: We're not bad guys. We're just Jesse's friends.
translation.ja: ジェシーの友達ってだけだ

translation.en: [Skinny Pete] Just might keep you from getting spotted.
translation.ja: 見つからないように

translation.en: Yo, Skinny.
translation.ja: スキニー

translation.en: Why you doing all this?
translation.ja: なぜここまで？

translation.en: Dude...
translation.ja: アンタは―

translation.en: you're my hero and shit.
translation.ja: 俺のヒーローだ

translation.en: [Aaron] Look at that slow... like, push-in.
translation.ja: 見ろよ　この挿入シーン

translation.en: You can feel it.
translation.ja: 感動的

translation.en: It's so good, how close he is.
translation.ja: 表情がハッキリ見える

translation.en: [Aaron] Obviously, we thought this thing was done, but it still very much lives and breathes in all of us.
translation.ja: 終えたはずの役が 俺たちの中でまだ生きてた

translation.en: It was worth the 21 takes. I'll tell you that.
translation.ja: 21テイク分が報われた

translation.en: So much time had passed, but we're all still so close.
translation.ja: 時間が経ったけど 息はピッタリ

translation.en: And so, it's just like old friends coming together.
translation.ja: 旧友に再会した気分だ

translation.en: [man] I'm kind of indentured to Vince Gilligan.
translation.ja: ヴィンスには 逆らえないから

translation.en: So I get a note that says, "You'll be there," and here I am.
translation.ja: 〝来い 〞と言われて 来たよ マイク役 ジョナサン･ バンクス

translation.en: [man 1] They call you up, and they say,
translation.ja: 電話があって

translation.en: "Vince Gilligan wants to have you in another project."
translation.ja: 〝ヴィンスの新作だ 〞と 呼ばれた エド役 ロバート･フォスター

translation.en: And everybody says, "Excellent."
translation.ja: みんな 二つ返事だった

translation.en: I said, "Cool."
translation.ja: “いいね”と答えた

translation.en: They said, "But you can't tell anybody about this."
translation.ja: 固く口止めされたよ オールド･ジョー役 ラリー･ハンキン

translation.en: People started asking me, "Hey, what are you doing?" I said, "I can't tell you," and that's cool.
translation.ja: 周りの人に “秘密”と言うのがいい気分

translation.en: This is some top-secret shit.
translation.ja: 極秘だった

translation.en: [woman] I got the script,
translation.ja: 話の続きを読んで―

translation.en: and I was so thrilled to be able to see the next chapter,
translation.ja: 話の続きを読んで― 本当に興奮したわ ジェーン役 クリステン･リッター

translation.en: and what he goes through, and how Jane is a part of that for him.
translation.ja: ジェーンとして 関われるなんて

translation.en: I was sitting next to my wife.
translation.ja: 妻に言ったよ

translation.en: I said, "Hon, you're not gonna believe this.
translation.ja: ジェシーの父役 マイケル･ ボフシェヴァー 〝ジェシーの父は 生きてた 〞って 〝ジェシーの父は 生きてた 〞って

translation.en: Mr. Pinkman lives."
translation.ja: 〝ジェシーの父は 生きてた 〞って ジェシーの母役 テス･ハーパー

translation.en: -[laughing] -And so, it was totally thrilling.
translation.ja: 驚いたね

translation.en: It was really good. It was great.
translation.ja: 最高だった

translation.en: It was like coming home.
translation.ja: 家のようだ

translation.en: It was like going back to your high school reunion
translation.ja: 高校の同窓会みたいな感じ

translation.en: if your high school sold meth.
translation.ja: 高校にメスはないか

translation.en: Okay, picture is up. Here we go.
translation.ja: 上空カメラだ

translation.en: [Vince] The core crew of Breaking Bad and then Better Call Saul
translation.ja: この映画の主なクルーは

translation.en: is also the core crew of this movie.
translation.ja: ドラマシリーズの時と同じだ

translation.en: I have a great team. I mean, everybody here... This is the greatest crew ever.
translation.ja: 今までにない すばらしいチームだよ

translation.en: People like to say that they have wonderful crews.
translation.ja: 社交辞令などではなく 製作 マーク･ジョンソン

translation.en: This crew really is extraordinary, and it is a family of sorts.
translation.ja: このチームは最高だ 家族同然なんだよ

translation.en: Everybody here is so devoted.
translation.ja: 全員が身を捧げてる

translation.en: They're here because they couldn't not be a part of telling this story,
translation.ja: この作品に関わらずには いられないの

translation.en: And to see this script come to life in a film like a real western
translation.ja: 脚本を形にしていくと 西部劇のようになった

translation.en: was really spectacular.
translation.ja: 本当に圧巻よ

translation.en: We get to showcase landscapes like here in the Painted Desert.
translation.ja: ペインテッド砂漠で 撮影してる ペインテッド砂漠で 撮影してる 共同製作 ジェン･キャロル

translation.en: It's beautiful.
translation.ja: 美しいでしょう

translation.en: [Jesse Plemons] The cinematography has been incredible.
translation.ja: 映画の撮影技術には 驚かされる

translation.en: There were some moments out in the Painted Desert
translation.ja: ペインテッド砂漠のシーンは

translation.en: that just felt... classic.
translation.ja: 古典的な 西部劇のようだった

translation.en: [Vince] Marshall Adams, our amazing DP, is also a drone pilot,
translation.ja: 撮影監督のマーシャルが ドローンを飛ばし

translation.en: and we've got some shots from, you know, a couple hundred feet up.
translation.ja: 空高くから撮影ができた

translation.en: In the old days, we would have sent a crew over there and had them hike up the mountain.
translation.ja: 昔のように クルーを登山させなくて済む

translation.en: To have the opportunity to come in and have a 46-day schedule
translation.ja: 撮影日は 46日間 確保できた チーフ助監督 ジョン･ ヴィルダームート

translation.en: allows Vince to put something on the screen
translation.ja: だからドラマシリーズよりも

translation.en: that's gonna be more epic than the TV series ever was.
translation.ja: 壮大なシーンを 盛り込めたんだ

translation.en: [woman] My favorite thing to do in makeup is character work,
translation.ja: 今回はメイクアップの やりがいがある

translation.en: and that's why I love this movie, because there are so many transitions
translation.ja: 今回はメイクアップの やりがいがある ジェシーには様々な 変化が起きるの

translation.en: that Jesse Pinkman goes through.
translation.ja: ジェシーには様々な 変化が起きるの メイクアップ効果／ メイクアップ部門主任 シェリ･モンテサント

translation.en: We definitely needed to reference the show for all these flashbacks.
translation.ja: 回想シーンを撮る時は オリジナルを観た

translation.en: So we literally would be at home on a big screen
translation.ja: 家の大きな画面の前に集まり

translation.en: with a... [chuckles] camera phone, and going back through the episodes
translation.ja: 携帯のカメラを構えたわ 該当するシーンが出たら 止めて写真を撮った

translation.en: and going, "Stop, stop, stop!" and taking screenshots.
translation.ja: 該当するシーンが出たら 止めて写真を撮った

translation.en: We tried to remain true and authentic
translation.ja: オリジナルで着てた物を 衣装監修 ドナ･ ケイシー=アイラ

translation.en: to what the Breaking Bad characters originally wore.
translation.ja: 忠実に 再現しようとしたの

translation.en: And those clothes don't exist anymore. So we got to rebuild them.
translation.ja: 元のは残ってないから 作り直した

translation.en: This particular shirt here is a shirt
translation.ja: これは最終話で 加工／染め マーカス･モントーヤ

translation.en: that Jesse Pinkman wears in the actual series that no longer exist in stores.
translation.ja: ジェシーが着てた服だが もう売ってない

translation.en: So it consists of three different shirts that we pieced together.
translation.ja: だから３つを組み合わせた

translation.en: One sleeve, one shirt, one collar.
translation.ja: 袖と身頃と襟をね

translation.en: [woman] It's kind of nice to actually have a sense of the characters,
translation.ja: キャラクターが 分かるから助かる

translation.en: as opposed to most films where you come in blind.
translation.ja: 普段はゼロからだもの 衣装チーフ リリー･スコット

translation.en: My stuff is gonna fit you like a T, yo.
translation.ja: 俺の服ならピッタリだ

translation.en: Not like if you had to borrow it from Sasquatch over here.
translation.ja: 巨人の服を着ないで済む

translation.en: Can't help it that I'm sized for love.
translation.ja: 女には好かれる

translation.en: [Lily] When Jesse comes out of captivity, he goes by Skinny Pete's house.
translation.ja: ジェシーは脱出後 スキニー･ピートの家へ

translation.en: So, Skinny Pete sets him up with clothes.
translation.ja: そこで服をもらう

translation.en: They have to change him so he can be incognito.
translation.ja: バレないよう外見を変えるの

translation.en: So we don't really get a sense of his own look for most of the film.
translation.ja: だから映画では 前と見た目が違う

translation.en: Maybe don't, like, shave and whatnot, you know?
translation.ja: ヒゲはそらない方がいい

translation.en: Uh, be less... recognizable?
translation.ja: 気付かれないように

translation.en: For this particular film, we are jumping all over the place.
translation.ja: この映画には いろんな場面があるから この映画には いろんな場面があるから ヘア部門主任 ロリ･マッコイ･ベル

translation.en: And therefore, we have a bunch of wigs in all different lengths.
translation.ja: 様々な長さの ウィッグを用意した

translation.en: You know, it takes a village.
translation.ja: 総動員だな

translation.en: [Lori] We have him everywhere. We have him hit with a fire hose.
translation.ja: 水を噴射されるとか いろいろよ

translation.en: We have him in a shower.
translation.ja: シャワーシーンも

translation.en: And he actually, like, took his hands and went...
translation.ja: 彼はこうやって手で髪を…

translation.en: like he's washing his hair. I'm like, "Ah!"
translation.ja: 洗うから “やめて！”って

translation.en: It withstood it, but you're like this. Like...
translation.ja: 髪は持ちこたえたけど 焦ったわ

translation.en: What are you better at, going forwards or backwards?
translation.ja: 前に進む？　後ろに下がる？

translation.en: Okay, well, let's both go sideways for a while.
translation.ja: ２人で横に進もう

translation.en: [Aaron] I haven't played a Jesse and Todd scene in years.
translation.ja: ジェシーとトッドのシーンは 久しぶりだ

translation.en: We definitely get a deeper look inside of... Todd's mind.
translation.ja: トッドの心情を 深く知ることができる

translation.en: [Jesse Plemons] First and foremost, I was very happy to finally know what kind of music Todd listens to,
translation.ja: トッドの好きな音楽を 知ることができてよかった

translation.en: which is, like, 70's yacht rock.
translation.ja: 70年代のヨットロックだ

translation.en: [Jesse Plemons] I was worried beforehand as to whether or not he was still in there,
translation.ja: ちゃんと演じられるか 心配だったよ

translation.en: or I could remember what I did six years ago.
translation.ja: ６年前の演技ができるか 自信がなかった

translation.en: Seeing the shape Jesse is in... definitely jogged my memory. [chuckling]
translation.ja: でもジェシーと演じてたら 記憶が戻ってきたんだ

translation.en: The way he plays Todd is not menacing.
translation.ja: 彼の演じるトッドは怖くない

translation.en: You know, when he does certain looks, it sends chills down my spine,
translation.ja: ある目つきで見られると 背筋がゾクゾクするが

translation.en: but he's smiling at me.
translation.ja: 顔は笑ってる

translation.en: I think Jesse's part his pet,
translation.ja: ジェシーのペットが登場する

translation.en: and he thinks that what he's doing is best for him, -even if Jesse doesn't realize it. -[whistles]
translation.ja: ジェシーに気付かれなくとも 彼は全力で尽くそうとする

translation.en: He's just missing certain common human emotions. [chuckles]
translation.ja: 彼は人間的な感情が 一部 欠落してる

translation.en: How you like my place?
translation.ja: 俺の家はどうだ？

translation.en: Uh, yeah, it's-- it's nice.
translation.ja: いいところだ

translation.en: Kinda... pastel.
translation.ja: パステル調で いい感じだ

translation.en: We are on the set of Todd Alquist's apartment,
translation.ja: これは トッドのアパートのセットだ

translation.en: and, uh, I love this. This tickles me.
translation.ja: 満足のいく出来だよ

translation.en: It's a third floor apartment in real life.
translation.ja: 実際に３階の部屋だが

translation.en: And so, they built the whole set on this, uh, riser
translation.ja: セット全体を 底上げして作った

translation.en: that takes it four feet off the ground.
translation.ja: 1.2メートルほど高い

translation.en: Todd is a really interesting character.
translation.ja: トッドは礼儀正しくて 思いやりもある

translation.en: Outwardly, he's very polite, he's considerate,
translation.ja: トッドは礼儀正しくて 思いやりもある プロダクション デザイン ジュディ･リー プロダクション デザイン ジュディ･リー

translation.en: and he genuinely feels bad
translation.ja: プロダクション デザイン ジュディ･リー 誰かを殺したりすると 罪悪感を抱くの

translation.en: when he kills or hurts someone, or something.
translation.ja: 誰かを殺したりすると 罪悪感を抱くの

translation.en: Where are we gonna... take her?
translation.ja: どこに…　運ぶ気だ？

translation.en: Someplace pretty.
translation.ja: きれいな場所

translation.en: She deserves that.
translation.ja: それくらいはしたい

translation.en: [Judy] When you first walk into his home, it is very sunny. It's very PAAS Easter egg pallet.
translation.ja: 彼の部屋に入ると 明るい部屋だと思うけど

translation.en: But then he has this whole other dark side that can flip very quickly,
translation.ja: その印象はすぐに覆される

translation.en: and that's where we end up in his bedroom. You come across the darker side of him.
translation.ja: 寝室に入ると 彼の陰気さが見てとれるわ

translation.en: The scorpion chair was something that Vince had brought to the table,
translation.ja: サソリのいすは ヴィンスが調達

translation.en: and then the snow globes were really about his personality.
translation.ja: スノードームには 本人らしさが出てる

translation.en: I mean, it's hard to pick a favorite, you know?
translation.ja: どれもいいね

translation.en: [Jesse Plemons] So, the baby is eating a snake? [man] Oh, yeah.
translation.ja: 赤ちゃんが ヘビを食べてるね

translation.en: As you can see, he's got some interesting taste.
translation.ja: 見てのとおり 彼は独自のセンスを持ってる 見てのとおり 彼は独自のセンスを持ってる 小道具アシスタント トリーナ･シオピー

translation.en: [Judy] They are kind of cheerful, and they're this sort of happy souvenir that you give as gifts,
translation.ja: どれも陽気な感じで お土産に向いてそうだけど

translation.en: but upon closer inspection, you see that they're slightly off, slightly twisted.
translation.ja: 近くで見ると どこかイカれてるの

translation.en: I mean, I love this one 'cause there's something... so it's not just cute. There's something off-putting.
translation.ja: 見ると不快感が湧くところが キュートでいいよ

translation.en: Vince's note was to add something even weirder to it.
translation.ja: ヴィンスのひと言で もっと奇妙にした

translation.en: Like, you know, some random, little fishbowl.
translation.ja: さらに 小さな金魚鉢を飾ったの

translation.en: It's not at all what I envisioned,
translation.ja: 断言するわけじゃないが

translation.en: but Todd with money, that's what you get.
translation.ja: トッドはカネがすべてだ

translation.en: Yeah, no crazy in this house.
translation.ja: 何ら異常はなさそうだ

translation.en: Perfectly normal.
translation.ja: 極めてまとも

translation.en: Hey, Jesse-- Aaron, rather.
translation.ja: ジェシー　いやアーロン

translation.en: Keep doing what you're doing. Keep doing that. Tap your hand on that wall
translation.ja: その調子で壁をたたき続けろ

translation.en: and shine your light.
translation.ja: そして照らせ

translation.en: We are finishing up the big search,
translation.ja: ジェシーが18時間ほどかけた 家中を物色するシーンだ

translation.en: as Jesse has spent 16, 18 hours straight tearing this place apart
translation.ja: ジェシーが18時間ほどかけた 家中を物色するシーンだ 辺りを散らかしながら カネを探す

translation.en: looking for the money.
translation.ja: 辺りを散らかしながら カネを探す

translation.en: We're in between takes on this crazy shot, looking straight down from the rafters.
translation.ja: 彼の周りで撮影しながら 上からも撮ってた

translation.en: You can see the camera way up there, 40, 45 feet up.
translation.ja: 12～13メートル上に カメラがある

translation.en: [Aaron] It was Judy's idea to build Todd's apartment
translation.ja: ジュディの案で アパートのサイズを―

translation.en: the exact same size as the frame of the camera.
translation.ja: カメラのフレームに 合うように作った

translation.en: Just watching Jesse desperately searching for this money is beautiful.
translation.ja: ジェシーが必死に探す様子が よく分かる

translation.en: You can see from here already how we're gonna shoot the stage.
translation.ja: ここからでも どう撮影してるか分かるわね

translation.en: And if we go all the way up, we'll be able to see it completely.
translation.ja: 上まで行けば 完全に見てとれる

translation.en: When I first read the script,
translation.ja: 脚本を読んだ時

translation.en: I saw his character searching throughout the apartment as a mouse within a maze,
translation.ja: このシーンのジェシーは 迷路にいるネズミに思えた

translation.en: and I thought how cool it would be to then pull up
translation.ja: だから上から撮影すれば

translation.en: to see the maze, to really show that he had searched everywhere.
translation.ja: 迷路で探し回る彼の様子が 伝わると思ったの

translation.en: You have 90 minutes of takes, and the whole thing will get boiled down
translation.ja: カネを探し回るシーンに 90分の撮影時間をかけたが

translation.en: into you searching for maybe 15, 20 seconds of screen time.
translation.ja: カネを探し回るシーンに 90分の撮影時間をかけたが 実際に映るのは20秒ほどだ

translation.en: The greatest 15 to 20 seconds of screen time ever.
translation.ja: かつてなく濃厚な20秒だな

translation.en: Yeah!
translation.ja: そうだ

translation.en: [Judy] The compound lab we had to recreate,
translation.ja: ラボは完全に崩壊したから

translation.en: we couldn't go back to the original place 'cause it was completely leveled.
translation.ja: 元の状態に戻せなかった

translation.en: So we had to just basically use the drawings, the screengrabs,
translation.ja: だから既存の映像などを かき集めて

translation.en: and whatever information you can cobble together to recreate it.
translation.ja: なんとか再現したの

translation.en: [Vince] It's a lot of the original equipment from Breaking Bad.
translation.ja: ドラマで使った物が残ってる

translation.en: As a matter of fact, Walter White's bloody handprint is still on one of the cooking vessels.
translation.ja: 実は ウォルターの血は まだ調理器具についてる

translation.en: Technically, it's not supposed to be there because this is before all those events happened,
translation.ja: すべてが起きる前だから 血がついてると変だが

translation.en: but, uh, I didn't have the heart to-- to clean it off.
translation.ja: 消す気になれなかった

translation.en: That's a little Easter egg if you can spot it in the finished footage.
translation.ja: よく見ると 気付くかもしれない

translation.en: Part of it felt like you never left.
translation.ja: 過去に戻ったように ケニー役 ケヴィン･ランキン

translation.en: You know, this set is exactly what it was when we were here six years ago.
translation.ja: ６年前と まったく同じセットだった

translation.en: Kenny, if he breaks his leg, he's not gonna be able to cook.
translation.ja: 足を折ったらネタを作れない

translation.en: What, are you the fucking HR department? Jesus, Toddie, relax.
translation.ja: お前は人事部か？ 落ち着けよ

translation.en: Tell you what. Everybody freeze.
translation.ja: 凍えそうだ

translation.en: And let's have focus on... on, uh, Scott.
translation.ja: スコットにフォーカスしよう

translation.en: I was a Breaking Bad fan. So much so,
translation.ja: この作品のファンだった

translation.en: that the first three days of my honeymoon with my wife,
translation.ja: 新婚旅行中に３日間 新婚旅行中に３日間 ニール役 スコット･ マッカーサー ニール役 スコット･ マッカーサー

translation.en: we actually stayed in the hotel room watching season three.
translation.ja: ニール役 スコット･ マッカーサー 妻とホテルで シーズン３を見てたよ 妻とホテルで シーズン３を見てたよ

translation.en: Of course, being a fan of the show, leading up to this production,
translation.ja: 出演して再認識した

translation.en: you realize these characters are operating
translation.ja: この作品の登場人物たちは

translation.en: from moment-to-moment to fulfill their needs.
translation.ja: その時の欲求を満たすために 動いてる

translation.en: And whether they're betraying a value or not isn't necessarily the compass they're using.
translation.ja: 正しい行為かそうでないかを 第一に考えるわけじゃない

translation.en: And Vince's ability to just continually escalate the world,
translation.ja: ヴィンスの手腕によって

translation.en: he gives you so much that you just hope to keep the ball in the air for him.
translation.ja: 視聴者は 常にハラハラさせられる

translation.en: You ready?
translation.ja: 用意は？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.ja: ああ

translation.en: [Aaron] I love Krysten Ritter so much.
translation.ja: クリステンは最高だ

translation.en: I haven't played a Jesse and Jane scene in ten years,
translation.ja: ジェシーとジェーン ２人のシーンは10年ぶりだ

translation.en: because, you know, Jane met her demise in season two.
translation.ja: 彼女はシーズン２で亡くなる

translation.en: [Krysten] I love the relationship between Jane and Jesse,
translation.ja: ２人の関係が好きよ

translation.en: and I love that we get to see a scene and see a side that we didn't see in series.
translation.ja: ドラマでは語られなかった エピソードが見られる

translation.en: It's not every day that a show that is that huge and successful
translation.ja: あれほど大ヒットした作品が

translation.en: gets to come back and take a little victory lap.
translation.ja: 返り咲くのは貴重なことよ

translation.en: This is definitely a film for the fans. And for everybody. It's for everybody.
translation.ja: これはファンのための映画だ

translation.en: -Except kids. [laughing] -Yeah, don't bring your kids.
translation.ja: 子供以外ね 子供は連れてくるな

translation.en: It's been surreal and a lot of fun to go back in time like this.
translation.ja: 時間をさかのぼるというのは 本当に楽しい

translation.en: I think all of our fans will just be so thrilled to see this next chapter,
translation.ja: ファンは先が知りたくて ウズウズするだろう

translation.en: but I think it really gives some closure for this character.
translation.ja: 今作である種の 終幕を迎えることになる
